title: Monsters Footsteps SFX: Small to Huge Creature
description: The Monsters Footsteps sound effects pack features 290 high quality sounds to make your creatures or animals come to life. Walking - running sounds for small creatures, orcs, trolls, dragons, Huge monsters, or dinosaur style stomps -  RPG, FPS etc.
longDescription:
Audio demo (with a background music behind) here: https://youtu.be/fpla_jYE0kE

With 290 SFX including variations, This audio pack is perfect to give some depth to your game monsters and creatures.

2 legged and 4 legged creatures included, some with armor sound!


Don't hesitate to check my other sound effects here: IndieGameModels Store

Do you want to optimize the performance of your game? Check this awesome plugin! Dynamic Lighting Portal System (+30 to 60% FPS increase)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Huge monster Footsteps: x9
  • Large 2 legged: x34 (with and without armor variations included)
  • Large 4 legged: x16
  • Medium 2 legged: x34 (with and without armor variations included)
  • Medium 4 legged: x35
  • Small 2 legged: x57
  • Small 4 legged: x68
  • Small 4 legged monster with claws: x34

Â 

Number of Audio tracks: 290

Number of Audio Cues: 290

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1khz 16bit MONO Wav

Does music\audio loop: YES and NO (the ones that need to loop are looping)
